channel.title: CVE Feed for SugarSync -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SugarSync -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-4461|2024-08-01T20:40:47.107Z -- sugarsync -- sugarsync
item.description: Unquoted path or search item vulnerability in SugarSync versions prior to 4.1.3 for Windows. This misconfiguration could allow an unauthorized local user to inject arbitrary code into the unquoted service path, resulting in privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2024-4461|2024-06-06T19:49:54.155Z -- sugarsync -- sugarsync
item.description: Unquoted path or search item vulnerability in SugarSync versions prior to 4.1.3 for Windows. This misconfiguration could allow an unauthorized local user to inject arbitrary code into the unquoted service path, resulting in privilege escalation.
